description:
Troy was a little curious about how it would feel to get his dick sucked by another guy.
"I've never tried it," he said.
"Never?"
"Never," he replied. "My girlfriend goes down on me all the time. I'm interested to see how it compares."
Austin was really excited. He seemed anxious to begin.
"You gonna give him a good working over?"
Austin laughed.
"Oh yeah," he said. "He's going to like it!"
Austin was true to his word. He worked Troy's cock pretty thoroughly. Troy kept feeling like he wanted to nut.
"It's really intense," he told us.
After Troy gave Austin a nice "pearl necklace," both of them looked very content!
"How was it buddy?" we asked Troy. "You're out of breath huh? You're a very happy camper right now!"
"Very happy," Troy said with a spent smile.
title: Troy & Austin
